TEXT.S:
South Africau South Africa sa i labu nu Fey-cuo, itiza i 29 00 S, 24 00 E. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 1,219,090 km2. u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 1,214,470 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 4,620 km2. hamin nu tademaw sa 54,300,704. kakalukan umah sa 79.40%, kilakilangan umah sa 7.60%, zumaay henay umah sa 13%.
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Pretoria.
kakinginan nu kanatal demiadkakinging nu kanatal demiad sa 27 bulad 4 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Cyril Ramaphosa (Siliel.Lamabusa ·), 1952 a mihca 11 a bulad 17 a demiad nalecuhan. u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu South Africaayza, micakat a demiad sa i 2018 a mihca 2 bulad 15 demiad.
laylay1652
mukasi a laylay (ayawan i 1652) "" katuud ku mabulaway tayda itida i South Africamalaaydaay a "bihkac ni Edek a kanatal".
South Africaini i kanatal idaw henay ku masamukasiay nu mikinkiway a tademaw atu masatademaway nu ba'tu nu babalaki. "" ninaniyadu' hiyan nu lanhekuo a cudad nu masakaputay mala kitakit ni pahetikan nu babalaki, pangangan han "nanuyanuyaan nu tademaw". nina pahetikan nu babalaki a kakitidaan idaw ku Setay-ke'hun-dan, uynihan i kanatal han nu tademaw a ba'tu saka siheci nu nababalakiyan a kakitidaan. 1924-- nuduma a kakitidaan idaw ku Sewaw-te'ke'-lanse, Kunduo-lin buhang Keluo-mute-lae, Ku'-puo buhungatu Malapa'. La'mende-te'i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku sepat a mihcaan itini i Fa-cuo makaadih tu sakacacaya a tademaw nu ba'tuan----Tawun wawa. - macacatay a tademaw nu kidu namakayda i Linpuo-puoa kenis nu Maka-panse-kaynu Ce-yiwpana kenis nu Keni-liyaatu Fuoluo-lise-padea nababalakian nu kakitidaan i , Kuaw-culu-Nata-e (-) a kenis nu lilis a buhung, itdai Tun-kai-pua kenis nu Kelay-sise-hea buhung atu Sikai-pua kenis nu Pinni-kawtian, Aylan-cecai-danatu papadengan tupah a buhang. 500 hatida nu kunyun lima a lasubu (500) a mihcaan malingtu, san a tademaw itini i timulan nu Africa (Fey-cuo ) patideng tu sapahabay tu sakaudip a kawaw, maala ku aadupan atu lalamian. """" unipahabayan pabeli tu san a tademaw masakaputay idaw kunipipadangan tu udip a kasilaculan atu kasi kawaw, mikilul tu san tademaw siakay nika tanektekan atu misaahebal, tanektek misaahebal, san tademaw a tumuk mapalekal ku kawaw. nina san dademaw pahabaya sipangangan han tu "Kee-kee tademaw", itidaay silumaay a tademaw pangangan han tu "Pu'si-man tademaw". 2500 kiya tusa a malebut lima a lasubu (2500) a mihcaan, pan-tua tademaw malingtu namakayda i Africa Sahara (Fey-cuo Sa-ha-la) likelikenan nu timulan a niyadu' nu Nize-he-sancaw-cuopasayda i Na-faamabulaw. itidaay a san tademaw atu musakamuay tu Pantua kamu a tademaw inai' ku nuudip tu a sulit, sisa nina Nafatini nu likisian hidasai nu mukasiay a cudadan makaadih kita tu kawaw nuheni. 1200 itini i kunyun nu cacay a malebut (1200) a mihcaan, pasayda i Africa (Fey-cuo ) amisan misiwbay amalingtu. satu, kiwkay mililiday a tademaw itini kalingatuwan amaadih, nisimsiman nuheni mikikaka tu kuowan atu hunhuo. kiwkay mililiday u mamelaway nu niyaduay a tademaw, idaw ku saka lihalay nida amatinen tu caayan a katinengan a kawaw.
mihinang kunuheni, micumud tu kuheni alan nuheni ku itidaay a tademaw u Kee-sana tademawKee-kee tademawatu Sa-ena tademaw. Pan-tua tademaw hamaw satu pasayda i timul malimad.
mikilul tu Pan-tua tademaw nu adidiay amalimad pasayda i South Africaunuheni atu niyduay a Kee-sana tademaw alaw malalamel kunuheni mueneng. nuni kaytinian i South Africaa buhung nikulitanu a katinengan. -1050 yai timulan a Pan-tuakamu a sipacumud i satabalay a Keesan nu kamu. mukasi mikinkiway tu pantua tamedaw nu muenengay itida makaadih tu yadahay nu Keesana tademaw a tuud. katinenga, Kuacu-luna-tae (-) niyadu' satabalay nu misa ti'kinngay a kakulian kya i cacay a malebut lima a bataan(1050) a mihcaan idaw a tahkal.
itini Limpuo-puosa timulan masakaputay a tademaw u Ke-saa tademaw, kamu han mahida u satabalay nu Keesana tademaw nu kaumu a picidekan. Ke-saa tademaw makatukuh tu aydaay a Tun-kai-pu niyadua tabakiya a buting sauwac.
mahkamalimad satu, nina tabakiya a mukinay nu zitatyan binacadan mababu liyasak malecad atu matabalay a binacadan. micubuk tu tayniay nu Intu'-yungtimul katukuh aydaay a Mozambiquea Muse-linmisiwbaya a tademaw, South Africamala tatelungan numisiwbaya, sasiwbayan a kakitidaan idaw ku kimngipin nu zu, atu numaka bataday nu layak nisangaan tu kaysing kupu a tuud, galasu a mali. 1487·124 cacay a malebat sepat a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku pitu (1487) a mahcaan, Portugalmitahaway a tademaw ci Pae-tuolu-mau. Tiya-se' (·) mililid tu O-cuoa tademaw misatadas tayda i Africa (Fey-cuo ) tumulancacay a bataan idaw ku tusa (12) a bulad sepat (4) a demiad, mahetik i Wuoe-wisewan. ·1485 uynihan inu aywan nida Portugalpacunaay tu balunga a tademaw ci Dia-ke-.kan (·) itini i cacay a malebut sepat a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku lima (1485) a mihcaan makatukuh tu saibataday a Africa (Fey-cuo ) nutimulanDiaw-sepacici mililis tu timulan a Africa (Fey-cuo ) nutipan a dadipasan. 148818 cacay a malebtu sepat a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku sepat (1488) a mihcaan cacay a btulat walu a demaad sa, tabaki ku bali sisa mililis tu dipadipasan talaayaw, tahekal tu Africa (Fey-cuo ), caay paka adih cinida tuni lakuudan tu Africa (Fey-cuo ) maka tumul a kakitidaan. 14885"Rio do Infante""Cabo das Tormentas" cinida i cacay a malebut sepat a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku walu (1488) a mihcaan lima a bulad makatukuh i Africa (Fey-cuo ) walian a dadipasan, pangangan hannida kya kakitidaan u "Rio do Infante", u aydaay a Kelu-te )a sauwac. nika taluma' cinida, miadih nida tu bayuay a ngawa', sisa pangangan han nida tu "Cabo das Tormenta". "Cabo da Boa Esperança""" kuowan nida ci Ea-hanesemisumad tu ngangan "Cabo da Boa Esperança", cinida ku pakakapahay tu Tunin-du'a niyaduay a tademaw tu sakaudip. Diyasekanamuhan a kawaw atu nikaydaan itini satu ici Ciwma-senu Portugala cudad "Luci-tani-ya a tademawan nu dadiw" sadadiwan.
